text: The Silver Car is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Silver Car 1921 silent film crime film directed by David Smith starring Earle Williams and Kathryn Adams. It was produced and distributed by the Vitagraph Company.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993: The Silver Car ==Cast== *Earle Williams - Anthony Trent *Kathryn Adams - Daphne Grenvil *Geoffrey Webb - Arthur Grenvil *Eric Mayne - Count Michael Temesvar *Emmett King - Earl of Rosecarrel *Mona Lisa - Pauline *John Steppling - Vicar *Max Asher - Hentzi *Walter Rodgers - Colonel Langley ==References== ==External links== * The Silver Car at IMDb.com * * lantern slide (State University of New York; SUNY) Category:1921 films Category:Vitagraph Studios films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by David Smith (director) Category:American films Category:American crime films Category:1921 crime films Category:1921 lost films
title: The Silver Car
